Articles.Content:
This is the story of when mech jeb tried to become the only pilot in the space program

One day a new rocket was about to launch. Mechjeb was excited because it would be the first lander on duna. However Mechjeb was left off for jeb who would never do anything evil to get on a flight. Mechjeb however was different......
It's just the prologue. It'll make sense in the next chapter when mechjebs plan is revealed
Well it's my first fan work so I wasn't sure how long I should make it

Guess what after long wait next chapter

Mechjebs first target was bob a member of the backup backup he snuck into the house at night and shot bob. This is breaking news bob Kerman has been killed in his home and mech jeb will take his place on the backup backup crew.perfect said Mechjeb now I can kill bill..............
